title: Spectacular Private Beachfront Villa with All-Inclusive Gourmet Dining
description: Exquisite beachfront indulgences awaits at Taveuni Palms Luxury Villas, your private slice of paradise in Fiji. These stunning villas each enjoy a private acre of absolute beachfront, with seven dedicated staff per villa ready to tend to your every need. Arrive to a grand Fijian welcome with an exotic Bula cocktail and a bottle of chilled champagne in your villa plus a revitalising 60-minute flight-recovery massage. All-inclusive gourmet meals await, with daily breakfast, lunch and four-course dinner plus complimentary free-flow soft drinks included. You’ll also enjoy roundtrip airport transfers, two 60-minute relaxation massages per person and a host of complimentary on-site activities such as snorkelling, kayaking and cooking lessons with your personal chef.
offer_address: Taveuni Palms P. O. Box 51, M Matei, Taveuni Fiji

title: Adults-Only Island Hideaway with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Indulge in an ultra-exclusive, adults-only tropical escape to Fiji, holidaying in true South Pacific style at Taveuni Island Resort and Spa. Leave the world behind for a villa getaway in paradise including all-inclusive gourmet meals, beginning with daily five-course breakfast, plus daily three-course lunch and tantalising nightly three-course dinner. Also includes VIP return airport transfers, one 30-minute massage each, welcome bottle of bubbles on arrival and more.

title: Adults-Only Island Hideaway with All-Inclusive Dining

title: Adults-Only Island Hideaway with Massages and All-Inclusive Dining
description: Indulge in an ultra-exclusive, adults-only villa escape to Fiji and indulge in a tropical island escape in true South Pacific style at Taveuni Island Resort & Spa. Leave the world behind for a four, six or eight-night villa getaway in paradise including all-inclusive gourmet meals-daily five-course breakfast, daily three-course lunches and tantalising nightly dinners-VIP return airport transfers, two 30-minute body massages to share, welcome bottle of bubbles on arrival and more.

title: Ultra-Exclusive Adults-Only Fiji Beachfront Hideaway
description: Indulge in an exclusive adults-only villa escape to Fiji, including all daily gourmet meals. Spend six nights in a Luxury Ocean View Villa at Taveuni Island Resort & Spa and enjoy daily five-course breakfasts, plus daily three-course lunches and dinners, return airport transfers, bottle of bubbly, romantic dinner in the Lagoon Bure, massages, traditional kava night, complimentary kayaking and snorkelling and more for two.
